document_data.name: Volland Moss
document_data.mainbody: '''Volland Moss''' was a young boy that lived with his family on a [[peat]] farm in the [[Twilight Marsh]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|11}}
document_data.Relationships: Volland was one of five children born to [[Millivent Moss|Millivent]] and [[Haldred Moss]]. He siblings included sisters [[Alleena Moss|Alleena]] and [[Kithian Moss|Kithian]], brother [[Quayle Moss|Quayle]], and baby [[Bo Moss|Bo]].
document_data.History: During the 1480s [[DR]],{{ToD-time}} the Moss family farm was ravaged by [[goblin]] raiders. Volland and most of his siblings were believed to be taken prisoner by the goblins, while only his mother and baby Bo managed to get to safety.
